title: Watch As Queen Beyoncé Looks Like A Goddess At The 59th Annual Grammy Awards
text: facebook 452 SHARES Beyoncé is a gift that keeps on giving! And, just 20 days after her huge and beautifully dramatic pregnancy announcement, also known as our reason to live—she broke the internet last night with her—ICONIC–Grammys performance. Tears were shed as the pregnant pop star took to the stage with an extended mind-blowing video introduction where she wore a golden string bikini and sang an emotional rendition of ‘Love Drought’ from her latest album Lemonade . In full harvest-goddess mode, Queen Bey, followed this gorgeous extravagance with pure simplicity, sitting down and delivering an amazing rendition of ‘Sandcastles’ . Some even credited Beyonce of inventing...wait for it...the act of sitting in a chair! Clad in a custom Peter Dundas golden gown and headdress, Beyonce closed the performance on an optimistic note, reciting the ultimate mantra for 2017, "If we're going to heal, let it be glorious...”
